actions.text: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Johnson, Sam.
On agreeing to the Johnson, Sam amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment increases funding for School Improvement Programs and Vocational and Adult Education by $50 million and $100 million respectively.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 130 in the Congressional Record of August 2, 1995, to increase funding in the bill for School Improvement Programs and Vocational and Adult Education by $50 million and $100 million respectively. The increase funding would be offset by a reduction in funds from the Health Care Policy and research acount of the Agency for Health Care Policy and Research.
